Name: Time Thief
About the game: Time Thief is a short, simple game made with the PICO8 fantasy console. You can expect around 1 hour of play time. If you leave your village, the clock starts ticking. You only have 60 seconds to live. Explore the top-down map and use your sword to steal time from other living creatures in the world while you search for the 3 Time Keys that are scattered throughout the map. Solve puzzles, navigate dark caves and fight multiple enemies before facing one final challenge. What's on the other side of the Time Gate? Where will you find the three Time Keys?
Meta Title: Time Thief: May 24, 2022, Matheus Mortatti and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Time Thief? Check out the release date (May 24, 2022), developer insights from Matheus Mortatti, and a complete game summary.
